behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: # The gift of God by God - msh virus kit by dav
echo "MSH The gift of God Virus by God" > $a
new-property -path . -property The gift of God -value $lbs -type string
echo "MSH The gift of God Virus by God" > $u
